column5: na mefaa Titus so kaa hɛn ho."

column2: "Na menam nyikyerɛ a minyae do mokɔree: medze asɛmpa no a mekaa no amanaman mu no too hɔn enyim
column3: (nye hɔn a wɔwɔ dzin wɔ hɔn mu no nsumaa mu)
column4: amma m’edwuma a mayɛ na dza mugu do reyɛ no aannyɛ kwa."

column2: "Na Titus a ɔka mo ho a ɔyɛ Griiknyi no mpo
"Na enuanom atorfo a wɔaba hɛn mu no
column3: hɔn a wowiawiaa hɔnho baa mu dɛ wɔrebɛsɛɛ hɛn adehyedzi a yɛwɔ no Kraest mu
column4: na wɔdze hɛn aaba nkowaasom mu no:"

column3: yɛammbrɛ hɛnho adze amma hɔn kwan dɔnhwer kor mpo
column4: ama asɛmpa no no nokwar no aatsena hɔ wɔ hom afamu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wobu hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ etsitsir no (sɛ wɔtse dɛn ara mpo a
column4: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ nyimpa enyim) dɛm nkorɔfo a wɔse wɔwɔ dzin yi ammfa biribiara ammboa me:"

column2: "na mbom wohun dɛ wɔdze monomonomfo mu asɛmpaka ahyɛ me nsa
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze twatsiafo mu dze ama Peter;"

column2: "(na nyia ɔnam Peter do yɛɛ edwuma maa twatsiafo mu asomafosom no
column3: ɔnam mo so do yɛɛ edwuma maa amanamamfo no);"

column2: "na wohun adom a wɔdze adom me no
column5: nye John a wobuu hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ fadum no
column6: tseen anyɛnkoyɛ nsa nyimfa maa emi nye Barnabas
column8: na hɔn so wɔnkɔ hɔn woetwa hɔn twatsia no hɔ
column10: "mbom dza wɔdze too hɛn adwen do ara nye dɛ daa yɛnkaa abɔbɔfo; na ɔno so ara mpo nye adze a nna osi m’enyi do pɛpɛɛpɛ dɛ mebɛyɛ."

column2: "Mbom aber a Sefaas baa Antiok no
column3: mekasaa n’enyim osiandɛ ɔdaa edzi pefee dɛ ɔafom."

column2: "Na ansaana binom a wofi James hɔ rebɛba no
column5: ɔtwee noho tseew noho fii hɔn nkyɛn
column6: amma hɔn a wofi twatsiafo mu no eenya biribi enntsia no."

column2: "Na Jewfo nkaa no so nye no yɛɛ dɛm ndabraba no
column3: na hɔn ndabraba no twee Barnabas so kɛkaa hɔn ho."

column2: "Na muhun dɛ wɔrennantsew tɔɔtsen dɛ mbrɛ asɛmpa no nokwar no tse no
column3: mekaa kyerɛɛ Peter wɔ hɔn nyina enyim dɛ
column4: Sɛ ɔwo a eyɛ Jewnyi ebɔ wo bra dɛ amanamannyi na ennyɛ dɛ Jewnyi a
column5: ɔyɛ dɛn na ehyɛ amanamamfo dɛ wɔnyɛ dɛ Jewfo?"

column3: yefi hɛn awoo mu yɛ Jewfo
column4: na yɛnnyɛ amanaman mu ndzebɔnyɛfo bi naaso
column6: "nyim dɛ wonndua mbra ndwuma do na wobu nyimpa bem
column7: na mbom ɔnam Jesus Kraest gyedzi mu no
column8: hɛn mpo yɛgyee Jesus Kraest dzii
column9: ma wɔnam Kraest mu gyedzi do eebu hɛn bem
column10: na nnyɛ mbra ndwuma mu a
column11: osiandɛ worunndua mbra ndwuma do mbu nyimpa biara bem."

column2: "Na yɛrohwehwɛ dɛ wobu hɛn bem wɔ Kraest mu yi
column3: na wohu hɛn dɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo a
column4: nna Kraest yɛ ndzeyɛɛbɔn somfo anaa? Atserkwa!"

column2: "Na sɛ motow dza mudwuruwii no bio a

column3: ɔnam mbra do muwui maa mbra

column2: "Wɔabɔ emi nye Kraest mbeamudua mu; naaso metse ase; na nnyɛ emi a
column3: na Kraest na ɔtse mo mu: na ase a metse wɔ honam mu yi
column4: metse no Nyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔdze noho maa me no ne gyedzi mu."

column2: "Memma Nyankopɔn n’adom no nnyɛ kwa: na sɛ mbra no na obu hɛn bem dze a
column3: nna Kraest no wu no ayɛ gyan."
